title: cmd/doc: const block comments apear after the const block in the generated docs
body:
Example:

Source (comment before the const block): http://golang.org/src/crypto/x509/pem_decrypt.go?s=472:490#L13

    // Possible values for the EncryptPEMBlock encryption algorithm.
    const (
        _ PEMCipher = iota
        PEMCipherDES
    ...

Docs: http://golang.org/pkg/crypto/x509/#PEMCipher

More examples:
- http://golang.org/pkg/math/big/#RoundingMode
- http://golang.org/pkg/text/scanner/
